title: Genflow Biosciences secures administrative approval of €4M regional grant
summary: Genflow Biosciences Plc, a UK‑based biotechnology company developing gene therapies for age‑related diseases, said it has received administrative approval for approximately €4 million in non‑dilutive funding from the Wallonia Region of Belgium, the company said. The support follows the previously announced award and formal assent by regional authorities, with the first instalment expected by May 2026 and […] The post Genflow Biosciences secures administrative approval of €4M regional grant appeared first on Longevity.Technology.
author: LT Staff
